author: RSalvatico
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #43164, in order to include in the 13_3 build the possibility of reading HCAL thresholds from database, for what concerns the EGM code.

#### PR validation:

Several runTheMatrix workflows.
title: [CMSSW_13_3_X backport] Change EGM code to be able to read HCAL PF thresholds from DB
